resources.string:
Benefits of the Plank 
1) Helps improve your posture. 
2) Ability to provide flexibility. 
3) Reduces stomach fat 
4) It can help strengthen your core.

Benefits of Lunges 
1) Helps improve your leg strength. 
2) Improved balance and coordination. 
3) Functional movement. 
4) Core activation.

Benefits of Push-Ups 
1) Helps improve your Upper body strength. 
2) Core stabilization. 
3) Improved posture. 
4) Functional upper body movement.

Benefits of Abdominal Crunches 
1) Helps improve your Abdominal strength. 
2) Flexibility and mobility. 
3) Postural support. 
4) Enhanced athletic performance.

Benefits of Tricep-Dips 
1) Triceps strength and development. 
2) Improved upper body pushing power. 
3) Enhanced functional fitness. 
4) Increased upper body stability and balance.
